import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Login.css' import Navbar from '../LandingPage/NavBar' import Footer from '../LandingPage/Footer' import {db} from '../../services/firebase' import firebase from 'firebase' import moment from 'moment' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Login = () => { //states const [login, setLogin] = useState(true) return( <>
Welcome to SimBull - The Stock Market for Sports!
{login &&
Log In
If you dont have an account, {setLogin(false)}}>click here to sign up
} {!login &&
Sign Up

I agree to SimBull's Terms
If you have an account, {setLogin(true)}}>click here to login
}
) } export default Login
